Caveats

  • Some registers are declared RW, that might just be W

  • Some registers are just guesses

  • The bitness of the registers are sometimes just guesses

  • If the we didn't know how many bits in the registers were valid we just assumed all of them

  • Not at all places were we were unsure, did we place question marks.

  • In the IRQ description the distinction between bits, IRQ levels, vectors of the GPU and 68K is a bit hodge-podge.

  • I had a problem recently recreating the IRQs I documented. I hope I messed up the second time :)

I think this documentation wins the price for most wimpy disclaimers per lines.

Nat! (nat@zumdick.ruhr.de)
Klaus (kp@eegholm.dk)
